page.title: 06Abbotsley Parish Council
page.content: The clerk of the Parish Council said that she enjoys her job.It is very interesting and she has not got far to get to the meetings .The parish council holds meetings in the village hall.The biggest problem the P.C have had is street lighting because it is hard to get the electricians round to fix the lights when they go out or go wrong.The Parish Council have a field for young and old and it is also a cricket pitch and they are going to have some swings and slides.They look after the village and make sure that the roads and paths do not have pot holes.They also look at all the local plans when people wish to build new houses.They are now encouraging the re-opening of the local post office.
